CustomField.inlineHelpText: Method of providing tickets to the allocated Family Groups
CustomField.label: Delivery Method

value.fullName: Picked up from Box Office by the Family Group
value.label: Picked up from Box Office by the Family Group

value.fullName: Delivered by Camp Quality (Standard Mail or Express Mail)
value.label: Delivered by Camp Quality (Standard Mail or Express Mail)

value.fullName: Collected by the Family Group from Camp Quality or another Location
value.label: Collected by the Family Group from Camp Quality or another Location
